channel.title: Jimmy Cliff on Hansen's Songbook
channel.description: Recent content in Jimmy Cliff on Hansen's Songbook

item.title: Many rivers to cross
item.description: Many rivers to cross But I can't seem to find my way over Wandering I am lost As I travel along the white cliffs of Dover Many rivers to cross And it's only my will that keeps me alive I've been licked, washed up for years And I merely survive because of my pride And this loneliness won't leave me alone It's such a drag to be on your own My woman left me and she didn't say why Well I guess, I have to try Many rivers to cross But just where to begin, I'm playing for time There are times I find myself Thinking of committing some dreadful crime Yes, I've got many rivers to cross But I can't seem to find my way over Wandering I am lost As I travel along the white cliffs of Dover
